excerpt: The TMCM-1630 is a compact single axis controller/ driver module for brushless DC motor applications. The device can deliver up-to 14A peak per motor phase (with proper heatsinking) and a continuous output power of 150...300W. The TMCM-1630 is made for supply voltages of 15...48V. Depending on the commutation mode the TMCM-1630 works with velocity and/or position control. The module can be used in standalone operation or remote controlled via serial interface RS232,CAN or optional with RS485 / USB using the Trinamic Motion Control Language TMCL.The TMCM-1630 is compatible with Trinamic's baseboard BB-163x.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial Featuresbreak before makeshort detectionslope controlCurrent Sense
